alert.note: Alert for Baraga; Iron; Marquette (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 27 at 8:00PM EDT until July 27 at 8:30PM EDT by NWS Marquette
info.description: The National Weather Service in Marquette has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Iron County in south central Upper Michigan... West central Marquette County in north central Upper Michigan... Southern Baraga County in north central Upper Michigan... * Until 830 PM EDT/730 PM CDT/. * At 800 PM EDT/700 PM CDT/, a severe thunderstorm was located near Covington, or 16 miles south of L`anse, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Three Lakes around 820 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Michigamme and Lake Michigamme. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
